    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Naboj in masa</string>
            <string language="en">Charge and Mass</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ladung und Masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Charge et masse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Carga e massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Carica e massa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δαπάνη και μάζα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Carga y masa</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vpliv naboja in mase na gibanje delcev pod vplivom električne sile.</string>
            <string language="en">The effect of charge and mass on the particle movement under the influence of electric force.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">naboj</string>
            <string language="en">charge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">masa</string>
            <string language="en">mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">električna sila</string>
            <string language="en">electric force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">elektrostatika</string>
            <string language="en">electrostatics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Effekt der Ladung und der Masse auf der 
Partikelbewegung unter dem Einfluß der elektrischen Kraft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'effet de la charge et de la masse sur le 
mouvement de particules sous l'influence de la force électrique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O efeito da carga e da massa no movimento da 
partícula sob a influência da força elétrica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'effetto della carica e della massa sul 
movimento della particella sotto l'influenza di forza elettrica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η επίδραση της δαπάνης και της μάζας στη μετακίνηση 
μορίων κάτω από την επιρροή της ηλεκτρικής δύναμης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El efecto de la carga y de la masa en el 
movimiento de la partícula bajo influencia de la fuerza eléctrica.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ladung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
